actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Governmental Affairs.

official_title: A bill to provide for full statutory wage adjustments for prevailing rate employees, and for other purposes.
short_title: Prevailing Wage Rate Adjustment Reform Act of 1990

summary.text: Prevailing Wage Rate Adjustment Reform Act of 1990 - Requires that Federal prevailing rate employees receive full statutory wage adjustments based on annual local wage surveys of private industries in each wage grade area.

titles.title: Prevailing Wage Rate Adjustment Reform Act of 1990
A bill to provide for full statutory wage adjustments for prevailing rate employees, and for other purposes.
